|| *Component ID* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HM_ACU BMA.HM.ACU] || Accessory Cuneate Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || receives input from cervical spinal nerves and transmits that information to<BR>cerebellum || upper extremity equivalent of Clarke's column ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HM_ARC BMA.HM.ARC] || Arcuate Nucleus of Medulla || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Controlling respiratory frequency || Receives fibers from spitothalamic tract and sends<BR>to CR ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HM_CU BMA.HM.CU] || Cuneate Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Carry fine touch and proprioceptive information from upper body ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HM_GR BMA.HM.GR] || Gracile Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Carry epicritic, kinesthetic, and conscious proprioceptive information from lower<BR>body ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HM_IO BMA.HM.IO] || Inferior Olivary Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Proprioception Relay from Spinal Cord to Cerebellum ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HP_PB BMA.HP.PB] || Parabrachial Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Source of short-latency nociceptive input ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HP_PRF_PVR BMA.HP.PRF.PVR] || Parvocellular Reticular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Flow of respiratory current out of organism || Projects to facial nucleus, hypoglossal nucleus and<BR>parabrachial nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HP_VB BMA.HP.VB] || Vestibular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Equilibrium, Postural Reflexes || Pons ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_HP_VG BMA.HP.VG] || Vestibular Ganglion || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Contact with hair cells of vestibular sensory end organs || Scarpas ganglion ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_MM_DSCH BMA.MM.DSCH] || Darkschewitsch Nucleus || Sensory Control Nucleus || Mediate the consensual pupillary light reflex || Light in one eye results in pupil changes in<BR>another eye ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_MM_PT_PTA BMA.MM.PT.PTA] || Anterior Pretectum Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Mediate somatosensory and nociceptive information || 3 parallel flows from MC, anterior interpositus<BR>nucleus of TH, GR to dorsal accessory IO ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_IZ_CBS BMA.SC.IZ.CBS] || Centrobasalis Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Unconscious proprioception to CR || Upper extremity, relay motor feedback to CR, major<BR>site of termination for dorsal root fibers ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_IZ_CCV BMA.SC.IZ.CCV] || Central Cervical Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Coordinate voluntary movements, maintain balance, and learn motor skills || Receive neck and vestibular input and project to CR<BR>and vestibular nuclei ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_IZ_RPL BMA.SC.IZ.RPL] || Retroposterolateral Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limbs muscles ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_IZ_SPCR BMA.SC.IZ.SPCR] || Sacral Precerebellar Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay unconscious proprioception, motor feedback to CR || Lower extremity and trunk, relay motor feedback to<BR>CR ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LCV BMA.SC.LH.LCV] || Lateral Cervical Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay Low-threshold Mechanoreceptors to CR || From Lamina V ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN BMA.SC.LH.LSN] || Lateral Spinal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Integrate autonomic and homeostatic functions || Projects to HT and lateral globus pallidus ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_CL BMA.SC.PH.CL] || Clarke's Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Unconscious Proprioception || To CR ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG BMA.SC.PH.MG] || Marginal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay information related to pain and temperature sensation || Pain sensation cannot be modulated ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_NP BMA.SC.PH.NP] || Proprius Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay light touch, pain and temperature information || With Clarke's Nucleus sensing fine touch and<BR>proprioception ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG BMA.SC.PH.SG] || Substantia Gelatinosa || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Relay for C-fibers of slowly conducting, poorly localized pain sensation || Second of two after proprius 1-order neurons ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PHR BMA.SC.VH.PHR] || Phrenic Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of diaphragm || Projections from Nucleus Solitarius ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PL BMA.SC.VH.PL] || Posterolateral Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limb muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_PM BMA.SC.VH.PM] || Posteromedial Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of trunk muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VL BMA.SC.VH.VL] || Ventrolateral Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of limb muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| [BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] || Ventromedial Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Innervation of trunk muscles || Upper and lower ||
